thread.title: Joshua Boatright

author: Joshua Boatright
title: Joshua Boatright
text:
I had a question/concern and Fernando Reyes took his time to make sure all was resolved. Fernando patiently listened and seemed genuinely set on making things right.
i am very pleased with the chairs, and even more impressed with the customer service I received. I would certainly and confidently recommend this company to anyone and everyone... ask for Mr. Fernando Reyes!!!
Definitely 5 Stars!
